divs: sighting detailsafter speaking with you, yesterday i went to look at my camera and was checking the settings ! i noticed the time is 1 hour 10 min off! i started reviewing my pics again and "found another pic of the ufo" .. this to me confirms what i originally thought and that its not a reflection\refraction of the camera. ( i know the camera times can be quirky but this camera is new and i have never not had fresh batteries in it!! thanks for your time and consideration.... sincerely ,, mark
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around July 5th 2009
